meta_title: Reference 7177 - Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 – Rehaut and Dial Details
meta_description: xplore the Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 — a rare 1970s automatic chronograph known for its black PVD case, red 3H dial marking and robust Lemania 5100 movement. Learn about its Rehaut and military heritage in the Porsche Design timeline.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177, Porsche Design Military Chronograph, 3H tritium dial, Lemania 5100, black PVD chronograph, UAE Air Force watch, Porsche Design Ref 7177, Chronograph 1, Top Gun military, Orfina 7177 rehaut, Porsche Design by Orfina vintage
overview:
All 7177 or "military" variants have a 12-hr rehaut ring, while the non-military
civilian variants have a tachymetric rehaut ring. There are two known variations
of the 12-hr rehaut ring.

text:
A slightly larger font rehaut found on the first circa ~500 7177’s ever
produced. This reheat’s seven features a crooked corner, hence the
name.

variations.title: Standard 12-hr Rehaut
variations.blueNote:
There are a variety of prototype rehauts that have been seen on examples
over the years, but these were not configured on any "production"
watches and
thus will not be discussed here.

text: A slightly smaller font rehaut is found on all other 7177 variants.
